dmca.title: DMCA Copyright Infringement Notice corinnaharney.net (70.86.49.73), dahmtriplets.net
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Cherkashina, Tatyana [mailto:TCherkashina@playboy.com] 
Sent: Thursday, February 22, 2007 2:47 PM
To: Copyright; abuse
Subject: DMCA Copyright Infringement Notice corinnaharney.net
(70.86.49.73), dahmtriplets.net (70.86.49.73), daniellegamba.net
(70.86.49.73), darvaconger.net (70.86.49.73)
Importance: High

 

February 22, 2007

 

ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. 
1333 North Stemmons Freeway
Suite 110
Dallas, TX 75207
US
 
copyright@theplanet.com <mailto:copyright@theplanet.com> 
abuse@theplanet.com
<http://cqcounter.com/whois/index.php?query=theplanet.com> 

 

Dear Sir or Madam:

It has been brought to our attention that web pages at corinnaharney.net
(70.86.49.73), dahmtriplets.net (70.86.49.73), daniellegamba.net
(70.86.49.73), darvaconger.net (70.86.49.73) display, without
authorization, reproductions of images owned by Playboy Enterprises
International, Inc. ("Playboy"). All right, title and interest in and to
these images belongs to Playboy.

I believe in good faith that the disputed images displayed on
corinnaharney.net (70.86.49.73), dahmtriplets.net (70.86.49.73),
daniellegamba.net (70.86.49.73), darvaconger.net (70.86.49.73) are not
authorized by the copyright owner, its agent or the law.

Accordingly, please remove the unauthorized reproductions of Playboy
copyrighted images on corinnaharney.net (70.86.49.73), dahmtriplets.net
(70.86.49.73), daniellegamba.net (70.86.49.73), darvaconger.net
(70.86.49.73) and on all web pages under your control. 

Examples of the copyrighted material can be found at the following
links:

http://www.corinnaharney.net/ <http://www.corinnaharney.net/>          
http://www.dahmtriplets.net/ <http://www.dahmtriplets.net/>           
http://www.daniellegamba.net/ <http://www.daniellegamba.net/>          
http://www.darvaconger.net/ <http://www.darvaconger.net/>            

 

I, Tatyana Cherkashina, under penalty of perjury, am authorized to act
on behalf of Playboy Enterprises International, Inc. in regard to the
above-mentioned unauthorized reproduction of the Playboy copyrighted
images. My contact information is as follows: Playboy Enterprises
International, Inc., 680 N. Lake Shore Drive, Chicago, Illinois 60611,
Fax 312-266-2042, phone 312-751-8000, E-mail address is
tcherkashina@playboy.com.

We look forward to hearing from you and resolving this matter
immediately.

This letter is not intended to and shall not waive or prejudice any
rights and remedies that Playboy may have at law, in equity or
otherwise. Any and all such rights and remedies are hereby expressly
reserved.



PLAYBOY ENTERPRISES INTERNATIONAL, INC.

Tatyana Cherkashina

Intellectual Property Assistant 

 

cc: Ana Cashman, Esq.
